attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our “wonderful” president. after i downloaded it my phone started glitching and everything changed. none of my photos are there anymore nor my apps or contacts. this app is terrible and i don’t recommend getting it

attributes.title: Cheeto Man
attributes.review: I don’t like this app. The color scheme was off putting. Despite the fact that that Donald Duck is a racist, homophobic, sexist, and all around piece of trash I like his hair! All around 7/10!

I got the app only to be FLASHED by some orangutan with a small peepee. Oh my god he was so ugly. My four year old daughter saw it and fainted. I had to bring her to the hospital and she needs to go to therapy for PTSD.

attributes.title: spam
attributes.review:
the worst app i have ever downloaded. i thought it would be a fun game about trump. boy was i wrong! it is full of glitches and bugs that caused my phone to throw itself across the room and off my 78 story balcony. now i cant find my phone and i cant call it because it crashed. thanks a lot trump! love you 😚

 xoxo gossip girl
